text: ==Battle== From there, he went first to Valiyan, which was under siege by the Mongols, defeated their two armies under the leaderships of Tekejik and Molger, and lifted the siege of Valiyan, with about 1,000 Mongol casualties.https://books.google.com.tr/books?id=36RwEAAAQBAJ&pg;=RA1-PT226&redir;_esc=y#v=onepage&q;&f;=false ==References==
title: Battle of Waliyan
